name: CovariantLorentzVector.decomp_stdBasis
declaration: theorem CovariantLorentzVector.decomp_stdBasis {d : ℕ} (v : CovariantLorentzVector d) : (Finset.sum Finset.univ fun i => v i • CovariantLorentzVector.stdBasis i) = v

name: CovariantLorentzVector.rep_apply
declaration: theorem CovariantLorentzVector.rep_apply {d : ℕ} (v : CovariantLorentzVector d) (g : ↑(LorentzGroup d)) : (CovariantLorentzVector.rep g) v = Matrix.mulVec (Matrix.transpose (↑g)⁻¹) v

name: CovariantLorentzVector.rep_apply_stdBasis
declaration:
theorem CovariantLorentzVector.rep_apply_stdBasis {d : ℕ} (g : ↑(LorentzGroup d)) (μ : Fin 1 ⊕ Fin d) : (CovariantLorentzVector.rep g) (CovariantLorentzVector.stdBasis μ) =
  Finset.sum Finset.univ fun ν => ↑g⁻¹ μ ν • CovariantLorentzVector.stdBasis ν

theorem CovariantLorentzVector.stdBasis_repr_apply_support_val {d : ℕ} : ∀ (a : Fin 1 ⊕ Fin d → ℝ),
  (CovariantLorentzVector.stdBasis.repr a).support.val = Multiset.map Subtype.val Finset.univ.val

name: CovariantLorentzVector.decomp_stdBasis'
declaration:
theorem CovariantLorentzVector.decomp_stdBasis' {d : ℕ} (v : CovariantLorentzVector d) : (v (Sum.inl 0) • CovariantLorentzVector.stdBasis (Sum.inl 0) +
    Finset.sum Finset.univ fun a₂ => v (Sum.inr a₂) • CovariantLorentzVector.stdBasis (Sum.inr a₂)) =
  v
